md:
giải nghĩa từ "notable" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan và các từ trái nghĩa.

* Notable (adjective) - đáng chú ý, nổi bật

Meaning: Worthy of attention or notice; remarkable.

Example: The notable absence of the CEO at the meeting was a surprise to everyone.

* Notable (noun) - người nổi bật, người đáng chú ý

Meaning: A person who is famous or well-known.

Example: The notables of the city were invited to the charity gala.

Related words: famous, well-known, prominent, distinguished, celebrated.

Antonyms: unknown, insignificant, obscure.

Note: The word "notable" can be used as both an adjective and a noun. As an adjective, it describes something or someone that is worthy of attention or notice. As a noun, it refers to a person who is famous or well-known.
